title: Start
body:
<<place tram>>

{{embroidery_face,default}} This is you. You are Blob

{{embroidery_face}} Your name is Blob because you are a Blob.
        

{{embroidery_face}} You are new to Melbourne, and you want to get around and meet some friendly faces.  

{{embroidery_face}} Let's go.

{{embroidery_face}} Here's somebody new. They look well-presented. And busy.

{{embroidery_face}} You are new to Melbourne, and you want to get around and meet some friendly faces.

{{embroidery_face}} Let's go.

[[Are you headed to the arts and crafts fair?|embroidery_face_1]]

[[Can you point me in the direction of the nearest Op Shop?|embroidery_face_2]]

title: embroidery_face_1
body: {{embroidery_face,happy}} ...Oh I love the arts and crafts fair! It's so fabulous. But no, I'm off to work.

title: embroidery_face_2
body: {{embroidery_face,angry}} ...Do I *look* like I shop at op shops to you?

title: LegoHead
body:
<<place tram_blur>>

{{lego_head,default}}Here's someone new.

[[{{lego_head.not_upset}}You look like you know your way around, do you know the way to the nearest park?|LegoHead1]]

[[{{lego_head.angry}}Excuse me, are you able to help me?|LegoHead2]]

title: LegoHead1
body:
No. I'm too busy to waste my time on parks.

[[Well that was short|LegoHeadReflection]]

title: LegoHead2
body:
Do I look like a friggen tour guide to you?

[[What just happened?|LegoHeadReflection]]

title: LegoHeadReflection
body:
Did this reaction surprise you?

How do you feel? Why do you think that happened?

Pop up: This morning their toilet blew up. They're irritated already, so whatever you say, they're going to be grumpy. Sometimes past and recent experiences can affect the way that people respond. It's not you.

[[Okay. Let's keep trying.|KomodoDragon]]

title: KomodoDragon
body:
Komodo looks a bit toothy. Also they are a dragon.

[[Hey mate why doesn't my Myki work?|KomodoDragon1]]

[[Anywhere near by that makes good craft beer?|KomodoDragon2]]

title: KomodoDragon1
body:
LOL Mate Mykis never work

[[Well okay|KomodoDragonReflection]]

title: KomodoDragon2
body:
I hate beer mate I have no idea LOL

[[Fair enough!|KomodoDragonReflection]]

title: KomodoDragonReflection
body:
How did that make you feel? Why do you think that happened?

Pop up: ... and sometimes conversations just happen if you are open to what happens. You are not alone, a friendly non-judgemental mind can lead to many conversations.
